abstract: Maryland hires D J Dirkin, defensive coordinator at Michigan, as head coach of its football team.
lead_paragraph: Maryland hired Michigan’s defensive coordinator, D. J. Durkin, on Wednesday to be its head coach, taking a key assistant away from a Big Ten East rival.

headline.main: Michigan Defensive Coordinator to Coach Maryland
headline.print_headline: Michigan Defensive Coordinator to Coach Maryland

snippet: Maryland hired Michigan’s defensive coordinator, D. J. Durkin, on Wednesday to be its head coach, taking a key assistant away from a Big Ten East rival.
